name: Ninja Storm: Origin
description:
Are you ready to set off with all the adventurers? Create your own adventure team and explore the unknown adventure in this RPG game!

==Endless Strategy==
Over hundreds of adventurer skills match the adventurer camp, and adventurers of different styles will restrain each other. You can use strategy and simple operations to enjoy the fun of the game.

==Meet more friends==
Form your own legendary organization with other players, and gradually climb to the top in the process of constantly competing against other organizations!

==Peak Battle==
Duel players from all over the world and use gorgeous skills to end your opponents!

==Relaxation==
During the adventure, you can also show your friends the mounts you get, enjoy the leisure moments, send your adventurers to travel the world, and get rewards easily.

[Tips]
